__prompts__.company: Author's company (or full_name again if no company)
__prompts__.repo_name: Name of the repository that's been created and cloned from GitHub
__prompts__.short_description: A one-sentence description of the project

project_type.__prompt__: What type of project are you making?
project_type.Cookiecutter: A Cookiecutter (make sure to say yes to the python doc question if you choose this!)

include_python_install_doc.__prompt__: Do you want to include Python/pipx installation docs?
